subject: Football
lead_paragraph: New England’s fifth straight victory was a surprisingly easy one, with the Patriots scoring 24 straight points to help Tom Brady improve to 9-3 in regular-season matchups with Peyton Manning.
snippet: New England’s fifth straight victory was a surprisingly easy one, with the Patriots scoring 24 straight points to help Tom Brady improve to 9-3 in regular-season matchups with Peyton Manning.
